2.2.1.title: Introducing the Announcement Banner
2.2.1.description: Stay updated with the latest news and updates in the extension through our new announcement banner!

2.3.0.15.title: New Feature - Ambient Effects
2.3.0.15.description: Introduce ambient effects on the Odoo Home/Apps menu to highlight special events and important days.

2.3.0.16.title: Odoo 18
2.3.0.16.description: Odoo Experience 2024 has kicked off (or is over)! Buckle up and get ready to dive into the wild world of Odoo 18!
